title: Virtualization and Containers: Better Together
author: Alex Handy
description: Having moved on from virtual machines and virtualization, it would seem that this technology is destined for the scrap heap. But as with most things in enterprise computing, old technology doesn’t just go away.
cntitle: 虚拟化和容器：强强联合
cndescription: 随着虚拟机和虚拟化技术的不断发展，似乎这项技术注定会被淘汰。但与企业计算中的大多数事物一样，旧技术并不会轻易消失。
